mapper.insert: INSERT INTO training_certificate (id,title,certificate_date,expiration_date,description,user_id, trainer_type, trainer, training_task, training_level, note) VALUES (#{id},#{title},#{certificate_date},#{expiration_date}, #{description},#{user_id}, #{trainer_type}, #{trainer}, #{training_task}, #{training_level}, #{note});
mapper.update: UPDATE training_certificate set id = #{id}, title = #{title}, certificate_date = #{certificate_date}, expiration_date = #{expiration_date}, description = #{description}, user_id = #{user_id}, trainer_type = #{trainer_type}, trainer = #{trainer}, training_task = #{training_task}, training_level = #{training_level}, note = #{note} WHERE id= #{id};
